s.text: It's now your opportunity to be a partner in our work.
The first time was to tell you about the impact of our educational program and, more specifically, To Kill a Mockingbird.
The first time was to tell you about the impact of our educational program and, more specifically, To Kill a Mockingbird.
The first time was to tell you about the impact of our educational program and, more specifically, To Kill a Mockingbird.
This letter is to let you know that, while we've experienced some success this season, we still need your help to continue our record of strong fiscal management and vibrant theatrical productions.
This letter is to let you know that, while we've experienced some success this season, we still need your help to continue our record of strong fiscal management and vibrant theatrical productions.

After record-breaking audiences for To Kill a Mockingbird, and opening our newly renovated Upperstage theatre with the critically-acclaimed Molly Sweeney, we just finished the run of A Christmas Carol, which was seen by a total of over 24,000 people, including nearly 9,000 school children from around the state.
This letter is to let you know that, while we've experienced some success this season, we still need your help to continue our record of strong fiscal management and vibrant theatrical productions.
The second appeal was to let you know about some of our artistic expenses you may not normally consider, such as the cost of hiring professional actors ($1,000 a week per actor!)
Your gift, and the doubling of these dollars through the two challenge matches will help us reach this goal.
This is free money that only you can help the IRT obtain.
